certifications.subtitle: CFA Institute
certifications.title: Passed Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) Level I Exam

recommendations: “Thank you, Prateek for the phenomenal work you have done as part of your summer internship with Digital Boost. During your three sprints over the summer, you helped us explore frameworks for going global, price sensitivities in our financial and operating model and created a pricing calculator for the sales team. These will provide a sound foundation for the charity to operate from in the future. I am grateful to you for your incredible acumen and knack for making highly complex issues appear to be simple. Wishing you all the best in your future - would work with you again in a heart-beat.” Show less

“Prateek led a group of LBS consultants in a project at my startup, Panda Packaging for 3 months. The entire project from start to finish was seamless, and Prateek went above and beyond with his efforts to provide the relevant information we were looking for. His work was instrumental to my startup, as the information collected and analysed, built the foundation required in order for us to proceed with our next steps. Prateek's management of this project was impeccable, communication was excellent, the questions asked made us dig deeper into our work at Panda Packaging and discover some vital findings that we perhaps would not have discovered otherwise. An excellent leader and all in all, Prateek is an absolute pleasure to work with. Thank you Prateek, the team at Panda Packaging really enjoyed having you lead this project! ” Show less

honors_and_awards.title: Global Finalist, AXA Great Global Adventure 2015
honors_and_awards.description: Placed among the top 20 global finalists (top 5 APAC region finalists) in the AXA Great Global Adventure 2015, an online adventure game involving brain teasers/tasks and recorded/live interviews, organized by French multinational insurance firm AXA (with ~26K participants from ~200 countries)

honors_and_awards.title: Leader of Tomorrow
honors_and_awards.description: Selected as one among 100 Leaders of Tomorrow at the 43rd St. Gallen Symposium at the University of St. Gallen, Switzerland, through the St. Gallen Wings of Excellence Award 2013

honors_and_awards.title: Finalist, BNP Paribas Ace Manager 2013
honors_and_awards.description: Member of one of the 5 finalist teams of BNP Paribas Ace Manager 2013, the fifth edition of an annual online business simulation competition organized by the European Bank BNP Paribas, consisting of 9 detailed case studies revolving around the bank's three core business areas - Corporate & Investment Banking, Retail Banking and Investment Solutions. The competition witnessed participation of more than 18,000 students from across the world with 3,465 three member teams participating in the… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Honorable Mention Prize - Private Banking Essay Competition 2012
honors_and_awards.description: Essay placed among the top 13 essays in the world in the Private Banking Essay Competition 2012 organized by Project Firefly, Switzerland and sponsored by Credit Suisse. Also recognized as an Elite Analyst on Project Firefly's website

honors_and_awards.title: Honorable Mention Prize - Emerging Leaders Essay Competition 2012
honors_and_awards.description: Essay placed among the top 13 essays in the world in the Emerging Leaders Essay Competition 2012 organized by Project Firefly, Switzerland and sponsored by Credit Suisse. Also recognized as an Elite Analyst on Project Firefly's website
